short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool to fully convert DOC/DOCX files to PDF.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy DOC/DOCX to PDF converter at your fingertips!

By clicking “Add to chrome” you accept and agree to install the FastCon Chrome extension, and setting Chrome® New Tab search to be powered by Bing and provided by the service and the Terms of Use at: https://fastcon.org/terms/
and Privacy Policy at: https://fastcon.org/privacy-policy/

The extension will update your new tab with a doc/docx to pdf converter.

FastCon Converter tool works for free. It can be used by all kinds of customers. Simply just drop the file and convert it in seconds.
